persistent_id: Persistant identifier of dataset to upload to. Change this cell to the persistent_id of your first file. See example below.
dataverse_url: Change this cell to the URL of the Dickinson Lab Dataverse. See below.
api_token: Change this cell to your Dataverse API token. In the Texas Data Repository, click the dropdown next to your name, then select API token. See example below.
filepath: Filepath of the file to upload, must be relative to where the DVUploader script is being run from.
directory_label: Optional directory label to upload the file to
mimetype: Mimetype of the file. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types/Common_types for common types. *m files often use the mimetype text/plain
categories: Optional list of categories to assign to the file, separated by commas
restrict: Boolean to indicate this is a restricted file.
